channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：突尼斯橄榄油生产商穆斯塔法-姆蒂拉维（Mustapha Mtiraoui）如果将其产品装在贴有标签的瓶子里出口，而不是散装运输，就能赚到更多的钱。但该国橄榄油行业内部的问题使这一想法无法实现
item.description:
WATCH: Tunisian olive oil producer Mustapha Mtiraoui could make far more money by exporting his produce in labelled bottles, rather than shipping it in bulk. But problems inside the country's olive-oil sector make that impossible https://t.co/2pnyM5RpcE pic.twitter.com/3cQM5I7ItY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国航空公司警告说，波音飞机的交付将出现更多延误，因为这家飞机制造商在今年 1 月的一次飞行中因一块面板爆炸而陷入安全危机，导致对这起事件和公司生产流程的调查。更多信息
item.description:
US airlines warn of more Boeing delivery delays as the planemaker continues to deal with a safety crisis after a panel blew off a flight in midair in January, leading to probes into the incident and the company's production process. Read more: https://t.co/PV76QiXr9J pic.twitter.com/8P2wbZKpxO

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 观看：突尼斯橄榄油出口行业的基本问题--包括融资渠道、装瓶厂短缺以及少数大型生产商的主导地位--限制了该行业的发展，一位获奖的当地生产商如是说
item.description:
WATCH: Basic problems inside Tunisia’s olive-oil export sector — including access to financing, a shortage of bottling plants and the dominant position of a handful of bigger producers — are restricting its growth, an award-winning local producer says https://t.co/2pnyM5RpcE pic.twitter.com/wKBUfeRVhY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 视频更正：汉莎航空客舱乘务员工会呼吁其成员在汉莎航空和短途航空公司 CityLine 举行罢工，以满足他们对高薪的要求，争取将工资提高 15%。我们正在删除音频缺失的视频
item.description:
VIDEO CORRECTION: Lufthansa's cabin crew union called on its members to strike at Lufthansa and short-haul carrier CityLine to press their demands for higher pay, seeking a 15% wage increase. We are deleting videos with some missing audio https://t.co/N71q0R7dKm pic.twitter.com/7DDrYVwDxg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国航空公司警告说，由于波音公司更多喷气式飞机延迟交付，他们的运力增加计划受到质疑，而波音公司的安全危机对航空业的打击正在加剧。更多信息
item.description:
US carriers warned that their capacity-increase plans were in doubt due to more jet delivery delays from Boeing, as the hit to the airline industry worsens due to the planemaker's safety crisis. Read more: https://t.co/PV76QiXr9J pic.twitter.com/qhyb5B9fws

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024

item.title: 观看：保时捷正在换挡。该汽车制造商表示，今年的利润率将有所下降，因为它正致力于推出四款新车型
item.description:
WATCH: Porsche is shifting into a lower gear. The carmaker said that profitability would be cut this year as it worked on launching four new models https://t.co/Lxh3yQpx1W pic.twitter.com/WYMzEI5kni

item.title: 观看：在全球玩具市场下滑 7% 的情况下，乐高公司表示，尽管中国市场出现下滑，但受美国、中欧和东欧强劲增长的推动，其消费者销售额去年增长了 4
item.description:
WATCH: In a global toy market that declined 7%, Lego said its consumer sales grew 4% last year, driven by strong growth in the United States and Central and Eastern Europe, despite a drop-off in China https://t.co/dZNflHDdkZ pic.twitter.com/2I0qpDoc1G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 12, 2024
